q_ch: 产品类型是Dress的缝纫任务有哪些？
q_en: What are the sewing tasks for Dress's product type?

steps.sql: SELECT p.id FROM products p JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id WHERE pt.description = 'Dress';
steps.description: Retrieve the product IDs for products of type "Dress"

steps.sql: SELECT st.id, st.start_time, st.end_time, st.planned_number, st.completed_number, st.status, wg.name AS working_group_name FROM sewing_tasks st JOIN order_product op ON st.order_product_id = op.id JOIN working_group wg ON st.working_group_id = wg.id WHERE op.product_id IN (5, 13, 21, 29);
steps.description: Retrieve the sewing tasks for the products identified in Step1

response:
Sure thing! Let's take a look at the sewing tasks for dresses. Here’s a summary of the tasks:

| Task ID | Start Time       | End Time         | Planned Number | Completed Number | Status | Working Group Name |
|---------|------------------|------------------|----------------|------------------|--------|--------------------|
| 14      | 2024-03-18       | 2024-04-08       | 120            | 120              | Completed 😄 | Master Sewers      |
| 13      | 2024-03-27       | 2024-04-06       | 130            | 120              | Completed 😄 | Master Sewers      |
| 11      | 2024-03-21       | 2024-04-14       | 140            | 100              | In Progress 🔄 | Premier Sewers     |
| 12      | 2024-03-27       | 2024-04-12       | 150            | 120              | Completed 😄 | Master Sewers      |

The tasks are being handled by the talented "Master Sewers" and "Premier Sewers" teams. Keep up the great work! 🧵✨
